title: $:/plugins/fk/soundcite
author: Florian Kohrt
name: Soundcite
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://gitlab.com/fkohrt/tw5-soundcite">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://gitlab.com/fkohrt/tw5-soundcite"/></$button>

[[SoundCite|https://soundcite.knightlab.com/]] is an inline audio player embedded behind text. This plugin makes SoundCite v0.5.1 (2017-07-10) available as a macro.
